body: Congratulations, John! You've won a special prize! Claim your prize now by clicking the link below: http://example.com/claim-prize Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity!
Congratulations, Jane! You're the lucky winner of our exclusive prize! Click the link to claim your reward: http://example.com/claim-your-gift Hurry, this offer won't last long!
Jack, you're a winner! You've been selected for a special prize! Don't miss your chance, claim it now: http://example.com/redeem-your-prize Act fast, and enjoy your reward!
Jill, you're a winner! You've been chosen for an exciting prize! Redeem it now by clicking the link: http://example.com/get-your-reward Claim your prize before it's too late!
Congratulations, Jim! You're the lucky recipient of a fantastic prize! Click the link below to claim it: http://example.com/grab-your-gift Act quickly and enjoy your winnings!

Hi Carol, Urgent Notice: Your warranty has expired! Act now to renew and avoid any future inconvenience. Click the link below to renew your warranty: http://example.com/renew-warranty Don't let this opportunity slip away!

Hi Dave, Important: Your warranty has expired, and a fine is pending! Immediate action required. Click the link to pay the fine and renew your warranty: http://example.com/pay-fine-and-renew Act now to avoid further penalties!

Hello Emily, Final Warning: Your warranty has expired, and a fine is due! Don't ignore this notice. Click the link to settle the fine and renew your warranty: http://example.com/settle-fine-and-renew Avoid additional charges by acting promptly!

Hello Fred, Immediate Action Required: Your warranty has lapsed, and a fine is pending! Click the link to pay the fine and secure your renewed warranty: http://example.com/pay-now-and-renew Act now to prevent any disruptions!

Hi Grace, Urgent: Expired Warranty Fine Notice! Your warranty has expired, and a fine is due. Click the link to pay the fine and renew your warranty: http://example.com/pay-fine-now Take action now to avoid further consequences!
